text: Sorrow is an emotion of sadness. Sorrow worse than sadness because it can last longer.Anna Wierzbicka, Emotions across Languages and Cultures (1999) p. 66 At the same time sorrow has someone admit that they have lost something.Wierzbicka, p. 66 It is a normal reaction to something that makes a person mad or when they went through something tragic. ==References== Category:Emotions
title: Sorrow (emotion)
